0.text: Lahiru: Ah! There comes the bus. Bye sister!
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: Ah! There comes the bus. Bye sister!</prosody></speak>

1.text: Sister: Bye. Where is your cap ?
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Sister: Bye. Where is your cap?</prosody></speak>

2.text: Lahiru: Oh! I forgot it. Can you get it for me, please? It's on my table.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: Oh! I forgot it. Can you get it for me, please? It's on my table.</prosody></speak>

9.text: 4. Why has Darren not returned Lahiru's book?

10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>5. Why was <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> in a hurry to go?</prosody></speak>

11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>6. What did <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> forget to take with him and where was it?</prosody></speak>
